document_data.name: Wavehall of Valkur
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wavehall of Valkur''' was a temple to [[Valkur]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], on Net Street.It's unclear whether the temple was built on [[Net Street (north)]] or [[Net Street (south)]].
document_data.History:
The temple was built during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref group="note">The exact date is unknown, but in [[1491 DR]] it was considered a "new" temple.

During the {{yearlinkName|1491}}, the ''Wavemaster'' of the temple was killed by [[Mirt the Moneylender]] over a dispute involving the priest's refusal to bring a deceased ally back to life.
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was inhabited by over a dozen priests from the [[Church of Valkur]], led by a ''Wavemaster''.
